alert.note: Alert for Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 2:38PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Palm Beach County through 315 PM EDT... At 238 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Indiantown, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Palm Beach County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
